verses.text: Now the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, and fell \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Gilboa|strong="H1533"\w*.\f + \fr 10.1 \ft slain: or, wounded\f*

And the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* followed \w hard|strong="H1692"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, and \w after|strong="H0310"\w* his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*; and the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w*, and \w Abinadab|strong="H0041"\w*, and \w Malchi-shua|strong="H4444"\w*, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*.\f + \fr 10.2 \ft Abinadab: also called, Ishui\f*

And the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* went \w sore|strong="H3513"\w* against \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, and the \w archers|strong="H3384"\w* \w hit|strong="H4672"\w* him, and he was \w wounded|strong="H2342"\w* of the \w archers|strong="H3384"\w*.\f + \fr 10.3 \ft and the archers: Heb. and the shooters with bows\f*\f + \fr 10.3 \ft hit: Heb. found\f*

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* to his \w armourbearer|strong="H5375"\w*, \w Draw|strong="H8025"\w* thy \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and \w thrust|strong="H1856"\w* me through therewith; lest these \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* and \w abuse|strong="H5953"\w* me. But his \w armourbearer|strong="H5375"\w* \w would|strong="H0014"\w* not; for he was \w sore|strong="H3966"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*. So \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* a \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* upon it.\f + \fr 10.4 \ft abuse me: or, mock me\f*

And when his \w armourbearer|strong="H5375"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* was \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, he \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* likewise on the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and \w died|strong="H4191"\w*.

So \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, and his \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and all his \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*.

And when all the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* that \add were\add* in the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that they \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*, and that \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* were \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, then they \w forsook|strong="H5800"\w* their \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*: and the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in them.

¶ And it came to pass on the \w morrow|strong="H4283"\w*, when the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w strip|strong="H6584"\w* the \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*, that they \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Gilboa|strong="H1533"\w*.

And when they had \w stripped|strong="H6584"\w* him, they \w took|strong="H5375"\w* his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and his \w armour|strong="H3627"\w*, and \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, to carry \w tidings|strong="H1319"\w* unto their \w idols|strong="H6091"\w*, and to the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

And they \w put|strong="H7760"\w* his \w armour|strong="H3627"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w fastened|strong="H8628"\w* his \w head|strong="H1538"\w* in the \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Dagon|strong="H1712"\w*.
¶ And when all \w Jabesh-gilead|strong="H3003"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* all that the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* had \w done|strong="H6213"\w* to \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*,

They \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, all the \w valiant|strong="H2428"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, and took \w away|strong="H5375"\w* the \w body|strong="H1480"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, and the \w bodies|strong="H1480"\w* of his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* them to \w Jabesh|strong="H3003"\w*, and \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* their \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* under the \w oak|strong="H0424"\w* in \w Jabesh|strong="H3003"\w*, and \w fasted|strong="H6684"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

¶ So \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* for his \w transgression|strong="H4604"\w* which he \w committed|strong="H4603"\w* against the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \add even\add* against the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, which he \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* not, and also for \w asking|strong="H7592"\w* \add counsel\add* of \add one that had\add* a familiar \w spirit|strong="H0178"\w*, to \w enquire|strong="H1875"\w* \add of it;\add*  +  r 10.13  t committed: Heb. transgressed *

And \w enquired|strong="H1875"\w* not of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: therefore he \w slew|strong="H4191"\w* him, and \w turned|strong="H5437"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="H4410"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w*.\f + \fr 10.14 \ft Jesse: Heb. Isai\f*
